title: Introduction to MarkLogic
abstract: This session introduces the MarkLogic products, defines terms, and sets the context for other talks in the Technology Track. Attendees new to MarkLogic should consider this a “must-see.”

surveys.comments: Need a better room. Room was to narrow and long. It was hard to see the presentation and hear the presenter in the back of the room.
Clear. Perhaps a bit too elementary. Didn't ask much about audience composition.

Good overview of ML. 
Good examples
Room to narrow and long. Hard to see and hear the presentation.
